title: Let's talk cricket
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
abstract: One woman's life long love affair with cricket
description: Alice, a Gungarri Elder from Echuca, is the former president of the Campapse Cricket Association and Warma Indigenous Cricket Club. In this warm story she reminisces about her lifelong love affair with one of our national pastimes - and reveals its social importance and grass roots support by Australians.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000396; Voices from the Riverlands: Njernda Project; Active; 2005
